dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the Abyssgloom. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Weakling! Do you think I believe your empty words?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your suspicion. Let me prove my intentions by aiding you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Aiding me? Ha! I have no need for the likes of you. Begone, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I will leave you to your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good riddance! Do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may regret rejecting my offer. Farewell, Abyssgloom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Regret? I fear nothing. Leave my sight now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may not trust me now, but perhaps in time, you will see my sincerity.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Time? Trust? Such futile concepts coming from a feeble being like yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I will take my leave. May the void consume you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the void consume us all, farewell.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will depart, but remember my words. The Abyssgloom may need allies yet.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allies? I stand alone and proud. Return when you have something of value to offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No need for hostility. I shall leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Do not presume what I desire. Leave before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: As you wish, Abyssgloom. I shall trouble you no longer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trouble me not, for it shall not end well for you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I take my leave, but know that not all who approach seek conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict or not, I care not for your intentions. Depart while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and knowledge. Will you share your secrets with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets? Knowledge is not freely given. What makes you think you are worthy?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess skills that could benefit you. A partnership could be advantageous.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Benefit me? Your arrogance knows no bounds. Depart before I show you true power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave. Your loss if you reject my offer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My loss? I think not. Be gone, insignificant worm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. Farewell, Abyssgloom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant creature. May the void claim you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your caution. I will leave you be for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Caution? You dare lecture me on caution? Insolence!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I meant no disrespect. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Disrespect or not, you test my patience. Begone, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall depart. May your knowledge remain with you, Abyssgloom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, remember that in your feeble existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge, but if you refuse, I will leave without further disturbance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is earned, not demanded. Your departure is of little consequence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall earn my knowledge elsewhere. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seek elsewhere and trouble me no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I depart, but remember my request. Knowledge may become a rare commodity.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rare or not, your words hold no sway here. Leave.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek conflict. I will leave you to the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict? Ah, a wise choice. Darkness welcomes you. Leave before it devours you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I heed your warning. I shall leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise indeed. Depart before the darkness claims you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the darkness. Farewell, Abyssgloom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant being. May the void swallow you whole.
